The following situations that appear to clearly violate your terms of
service such as libel and defamation of character of several private
individuals appear to be occuring on your servers.  The below is to help
you take appropriate action.  The discussion forum has been warned of
the legal implications, but have chosen to do nothing thusfar. 
 
 
http://www.menshealth.com.ph is hosted on a server housed by your
facility.   
 
The following thread contains libelous statments against employees of a
company who stand to lose their job due to insubordination, not to
mention the insinuation of intolerance of their boss if what is said led
to their termination.  The individual possibly made the statement
because he partially knows the general company policy, and it has caused
great distress to the individuals whose names have been mentioned. 
 
http://www.menshealth.com.ph/board/index.php?topic=183.15 
 
 
Another thread makes defamatory and racist statements against an
individual and others due to personal issues.  Again, the forum is
degenerating from a positive into a statement on degeneracy.  Most of
the moderators and board owners know the individuals in question, yet
they ignore the pleas of these defamatory statements made by the board
member LeePriest to go on, after having been given plenty of time to
delete the inflammatory thread. 
 
Here is a copy of the letter requesting stoppage of a degenerate
situation: 
 
Actually I'll wait until Monday at 6pm for you to resolve this since I
suppose it wouldn't be fair to take action on the weekend if none of you
are there to receive the message on this situation.  To be clear, I'm
not making threats against you.  But I cannot allow LeePriest to keep
this up.  We know his full name, phone number, company address, etc, but
we don't do the same to him.  What you are seeing is a former member who
got banned because he was caught watching pornography on his laptop PC
in our locker room.  The result is that he takes it to your forum for
his "revenge".  I know I would not allow such behavior if I was a
moderator (not that I'm asking to be one here).  I don't want to be
accused of anymore vested interest or bias than I already receive, no
matter how transparent I try to be. 
 
Besides libel, now it's clear that racism is a motive using the name of
an individual.  I hate to have to be like this, but these posts of
LeePriest will be forwarded to The Planet if action is not taken.
Screenshots exist from the last time he did it as well as this time and
both will be sent.  I warned you all that he would do it again.  You
need to ban him, or at least make it clear to him that he is going above
and beyond in his violations of board policy, not to mention common
decency.  To debate via handle is one thing.  To libel and make racist
statements is another using the names of prominant individuals in the
industry.  Men's Health only stands to lose by having people like him
around.  The ironic thing is that he'd never read Men's Health.  Flex
and Muscle and Fitness are all he knows. 
 
"Arcee, when Mr. Jason Postulka is not around, do bodybuilding movements
and isolation exercise, so as Aga, now what? anyways, LeePriest stands
for everyone, or on my side... trusted person"s" know these password...
well this is the former guy that the white man banned in Eclipse... you
are good with saying things up, let's just face in any competition these
april and may, just send me a PM. then speak out after a competition."
